extendedInfo.description: Drive a Monster Truck across impossible terrains!Compare times and global rank!Some levels require speed, and bravery. Others require precision and cunning. Make your own levels (using inksMoto - the level editor for xMoto). More details at http://www.chozabu.org Similar to these games: xMoto, ElastoMania, trials, mx motoBut in a monster truck instead of a bike :). Updated Updated [once in a blue moon] with extra levels and features.Level 1-4 in the "original" pack are quick and easy while you get the hang of the game.Features:-online high score. -4 Wheel drive. -Customizable wheel size. -customizable suspension. -customize controls. -complex interactive levels. -you can load your own levels! -Ice, Grass, Dirt, Bricks and more. -Simple graphics mode for very old/slow phones. -several control options (joystick, touch, keyboard, accelerometer). -realistic variable engine sound. This free version lacks a special bonus pack of levels - and Has Adverts. If you encounter an error please email me - I will do everything I can to fix your problem. Please include what phone you have, what version of android, what you were doing, what error messge(if any) you got.

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: DO NOT GET THIS GAME. IT SUCKS. THE CONTROLS ARE HARD AND THE LEVELS MAKE YOU INSANE IF U DON\'T COMPLETE THEM
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tried
reviews.comment: This game about a year ago, still has the same dissapearing buttons/in game objects bugs. Hard to play when you can\'t see the track.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When will the part 2 come out I\'m fished with it the game I loved it and well the grafic are just red and green and pink why and how I fix that when I fished it it never went back to the trees and grass and drit and ect

reviews.comment: Awesome game! Needs more free levels and in-game level editor. Well yeah, it\'s hard to make...

reviews.comment: Works again but now seems very laggy, goes all jerky and hard to control. Please fix, HTC desire z

reviews.comment: Really hard game, New update makes it force close on my galaxy europa, bring back the old version

reviews.comment: Controls don\'t work like 10% of the time so when you\'ve made it all the way to the end of a level, they might stop working and you have to start again

reviews.title: LOTS OF FUN! a little difficult at first
reviews.comment: but by far the best monster truck game, although it is a little weird as far as learning the controls and maneuvering the truck to do flips an such.

reviews.comment: I glitched it and unlocked all the lvls on \"old lvls\"....all u got to do is choose the last lvl....HTC hero

reviews.comment: Funnest game. took awhile to beat/many levels. Always the game the game to play when bored.. i want more :)

reviews.title: Great game

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.comment: This game is the best monster truck racing game on the market. It is very addicting and overall its just awesome     Samsung Galaxy S2

reviews.comment: I really dig this game.. I wish it were longer tho.. but still a great download... WATCH OUT FOR THAT ROCK!!!! Lol

reviews.comment: Addictive game and challenging levels. The only reason did not give it 5 stars was because half the time I play a level, a button is invisible.
